title: He got autofilled as supp and decided to play top
body: the guy got autfilled as support he decided to troll and went top lane and i was top so he had 2 top laners and kept flaming me for playing bad while he took my lane and i couldnt even farm please riot games i reported him twice and he wasnt banned like does it even matter when i get a lane can i just decide to go play another lane is that normal? i have pic but i dont know how to add it

replies.body: With jungle in a bad place, i'm surprised 2 - 1 - 2 isn't making a return

Flaming is a valid reason to report and you will leave it at that. That is the end of your involvement with this person, you will be wasting your time and exhibiting negative behavior in seeking further retribution. Drop it.

Was it ranked? If not, you and everyone else are free to play however they please, so long as it isn't intentionally losing. If ranked, you can resort to reporting greifing, because you have to have some cooperation that does not force others into a strategy they are not reasonably prepared to execute.

Enough seeking retribution and focus on yourself.
Who says that you have to follow the meta? Let the guy play duo top with you.

> [{quoted}](name=PhantomFury9,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KXivndHR,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-23T22:23:01.047+0000)
>
> the guy got autfilled as support he decided to troll and went top lane and i was top so he had 2 top laners and kept flaming me for playing bad while he took my lane and i couldnt even farm please riot games i reported him twice and he wasnt banned like does it even matter when i get a lane can i just decide to go play another lane is that normal? i have pic but i dont know how to add it

Your post feels quite toxic, tbh...
